short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly login to Salesforce Production or Sandbox environments. Developed By Alok Singh

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension simplifies the management of your Salesforce org credentials by securely storing multiple login details and enabling instant, one-click access to your accounts. It allows users to import and export credentials easily, making it a breeze to back up or transfer login information. Designed for Salesforce professionals, this tool enhances productivity by streamlining the login process and providing centralized management of all your credentials, eliminating the need for repetitive logins and improving efficiency in your daily workflow.
